*Publishing to RPubs*

Open RStudio and create a new Rmd file
                            (File > New File > R Markdown).
When you’re ready to publish to RPubs, click Knit.
From your knitted document, click Publish in the top, right-hand corner.
Select Rpubs.

Click Publish. You’ll then be able to create/edit a title, short description and customized slug.

********
Distill is a publication format for scientific and technical writing, native to the web. 

Learn more about using Distill for R Markdown at <https://rstudio.github.io/distill>.
